paramInformation.label: Remember State
paramInformation.description: After power failure, resume the socket previous state

paramInformation.label: LED Function
paramInformation.description: LED turns ON when socket is ON

metadata.inclusion:
Step 1. Set primary controller/gateway into inclusion mode.
Step 2. Either power cycle the product for power-on inclusion, or press the button and hold for 3 seconds.
metadata.exclusion:
Step 1. Set primary controller/gateway into exclusion mode.
Step 2. Press the button and hold for 3 seconds.
metadata.reset:
Step 1. Press the button 3 times within 1.5 seconds.
Step 2. Within 1 second of Step 1, press the button and hold for over 5 seconds until the LED is off..
